description: Bundles an Amazon instance store-backed Windows instance. During bundling, only the root device volume (C:) is bundled. Data on other instance store volumes is not preserved.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance to bundle. Default: None.

parameters.name: Storage
parameters.description: The bucket in which to store the AMI. You can specify a bucket that you already own or a new bucket that Amazon EC2 creates on your behalf. If you specify a bucket that belongs to someone else, Amazon EC2 returns an error. S3 (dict) --- An Amazon S3 storage location. AWSAccessKeyId (string) --- The access key ID of the owner of the bucket. Before you specify a value for your access key ID, review and follow the guidance in Best Practices for Amazon Web Services accounts in the Account ManagementReference Guide. Bucket (string) --- The bucket in which to store the AMI. Prefix (string) --- The beginning of the file name of the AMI. UploadPolicy (bytes) --- An Amazon S3 upload policy that gives Amazon EC2 permission to upload items into Amazon S3 on your behalf. UploadPolicySignature (string) --- The signature of the JSON document.

nested_params.name: AWSAccessKeyId
nested_params.description: The access key ID of the owner of the bucket. Before you specify a value for your access key ID, review and follow the guidance in Best Practices for Amazon Web Services accounts in the Account ManagementReference Guide.

nested_params.name: Bucket
nested_params.description: The bucket in which to store the AMI. You can specify a bucket that you already own or a new bucket that Amazon EC2 creates on your behalf. If you specify a bucket that belongs to someone else, Amazon EC2 returns an error.

nested_params.name: Prefix
nested_params.description: The beginning of the file name of the AMI.

nested_params.name: UploadPolicy
nested_params.description: An Amazon S3 upload policy that gives Amazon EC2 permission to upload items into Amazon S3 on your behalf.

nested_params.name: UploadPolicySignature
nested_params.description: The signature of the JSON document.

nested_items.name: InstanceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the instance associated with this bundle task.

nested_items.name: BundleId
nested_items.description: The ID of the bundle task.

nested_items.name: UpdateTime
nested_items.description: The time of the most recent update for the task.

nested_items.name: AWSAccessKeyId
nested_items.description: The access key ID of the owner of the bucket. Before you specify a value for your access key ID, review and follow the guidance in Best Practices for Amazon Web Services accounts in the Account ManagementReference Guide.

nested_items.name: Bucket
nested_items.description: The bucket in which to store the AMI. You can specify a bucket that you already own or a new bucket that Amazon EC2 creates on your behalf. If you specify a bucket that belongs to someone else, Amazon EC2 returns an error.

nested_items.name: Prefix
nested_items.description: The beginning of the file name of the AMI.

nested_items.name: UploadPolicy
nested_items.description: An Amazon S3 upload policy that gives Amazon EC2 permission to upload items into Amazon S3 on your behalf.

nested_items.name: UploadPolicySignature
nested_items.description: The signature of the JSON document.

nested_items.name: Progress
nested_items.description: The level of task completion, as a percent (for example, 20%).

nested_items.name: BundleTaskError
nested_items.description: If the task fails, a description of the error.
